casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
PINION. No. 138A94-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State/Pinion.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of October 2008 by Petitioner for Discretionary Review of Petition for a Writ of Habeas Corpus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
